p: Figure 5 : A horizontal cross-sectional view of raw and segmented X-ray images of three mini-samples. Panels ( a), ( b), and ( c) show xy cross-sectional views of mini-samples 1, 2, and 3, respectively. The top row shows the raw gray-scale X-ray images (oil, brine, and rock, are in black, dark gray, and light gray, respectively). The lower images show the segmented images of the same slice using Trainable WEKA Segmentation (oil, brine, and rock, are in black, gray, and white, respectively). Please click here to view a larger version of this figure.
